Text: i can't find the apropriate subtitles that macht with this version of the film.

Video: XVID 512x384 29.97fps 1166Kbps 
Audio: Dolby AC3 48000Hz stereo 192Kbps 
Audio: Dolby AC3 48000Hz 6ch 448Kbps

A bit of a waste of bandwith on the audio, if you ask me, since the movie was recorded mono.
The image has "A Woman of Paris" on the box refers to a tv feature that is not included in this.  This is only the feature film, A King in New York.
